comment:
Nose - fresh and sharp, vanilla, green apple, with some spice and a bit of pine sap
Taste - crisp, light sweetness and vanilla, some spice near the end, some tang from the tannins
Finish - more spice and some dryness, some warmth at the end
Still a fairly new distiller. Reflects in the tasting notes. Not too complex. Apricot, vanilla, and caramel. Using locally sourced barley.
